mapper.select: select bz.text,jz.jiuzhenxinxiid,jz.userid,jz.name,jz.shenfenzhenghaoma,jz.xingbie,jz.zhuyaozhengzhuang,jz.shoujihao,jz.age,jz.lianxidizhi,date_format(jz.chuangjianshijian,'%Y-%m-%d') as chuangjianshijian from patient_jiuzhenxinxi AS jz left JOIN dict_bingzhong AS bz ON jz.bingzhong = bz.id where jz.name like CONCAT('%',#{ppName},'%') and jz.shoujihao like CONCAT('%',#{ppShoujihao},'%') order by jz.chuangjianshijian desc LIMIT #{mmStartIndex},#{ppPageSize}
select count(*) from patient_jiuzhenxinxi AS jz where jz.name like CONCAT('%',#{ppName},'%') and jz.shoujihao like CONCAT('%',#{ppShoujihao},'%') order by jz.chuangjianshijian desc
mapper.sql: jiuzhenxinxiid, userid, name, shenfenzhenghaoma, xingbie, zhuyaozhengzhuang, shoujihao, age, lianxidizhi, zhuangtai, chuangjianshijian, bingzhong
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from patient_jiuzhenxinxi
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into patient_jiuzhenxinxi
jiuzhenxinxiid,
userid,
name,
shenfenzhenghaoma,
xingbie,
zhuyaozhengzhuang,
shoujihao,
age,
lianxidizhi,
zhuangtai,
chuangjianshijian,
bingzhong,
#{jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shenfenzhenghaoma,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zhuyaozhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lianxidizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update patient_jiuzhenxinxi
jiuzhenxinxiid = #{record.jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shenfenzhenghaoma = #{record.shenfenzhenghaoma,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingbie = #{record.xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhuyaozhengzhuang = #{record.zhuyaozhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shoujihao = #{record.shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{record.age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lianxidizhi = #{record.lianxidizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhuangtai = #{record.zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chuangjianshijian = #{record.chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bingzhong = #{record.bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update patient_jiuzhenxinxi set jiuzhenxinxiid = #{record.jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenfenzhenghaoma = #{record.shenfenzhenghaoma,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingbie = #{record.xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuyaozhengzhuang = #{record.zhuyaozhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shoujihao = #{record.shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{record.age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lianxidizhi = #{record.lianxidizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuangtai = #{record.zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chuangjianshijian = #{record.chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bingzhong = #{record.bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update patient_jiuzhenxinxi
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shenfenzhenghaoma = #{shenfenzhenghaoma,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xingbie = #{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhuyaozhengzhuang = #{zhuyaozhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shoujihao = #{shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lianxidizhi = #{lianxidizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zhuangtai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER},
chuangjianshijian = #{chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
bingzhong = #{bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where jiuzhenxinxiid = #{jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update patient_jiuzhenxinxi set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shenfenzhenghaoma = #{shenfenzhenghaoma,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xingbie = #{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuyaozhengzhuang = #{zhuyaozhengzhuang,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shoujihao = #{shoujihao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lianxidizhi = #{lianxidizhi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhuangtai = #{zhuangtai,jdbcType=INTEGER}, chuangjianshijian = #{chuangjianshijian,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, bingzhong = #{bingzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where jiuzhenxinxiid = #{jiuzhenxinxiid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
